# Tesla/Singularity Containment Loose Procedures In the event of a tesla or singularity containment failure (aptly named "tesloose" and "singuloose"), the station evac is to be called and the station alert set to [color=#c8a404]Yellow Alert[/color].
1. Attempts to stop the loosed material should be made, if possible, via containment weapons, such as the [bold][italic]Portable Particle Decelerator[/italic][/bold].
2. Command and Engineering are to do their best at tracking and notifying crew via Communications Channels of the location of the loosed tesla/singularity. It is not required, but vastly recommended of doing so.
3. Command [bold]must[/bold] open and set EVA Storage to Emergency Access.
4. In the event of a complete containment of the loosed material, if the station is relatively undamaged, normal shift activity should resume and the alert should be set to a safe alert.
